results.content: Very good content, course runs at a good pace, and instructor is very knowledgeable and attentive. As an experienced coder, I found instructor's advice very beneficial to those who are just beginning. I believe some more defined lab work (real world examples) would help cement the knowledge transfer. I highly recommend this course.

results.content: I have taken several Udemy Courses and this is the only one I have awarded 5 stars. I have studied aurelia Js framework for almost a year and would say I was familiar with the concepts here. But instructor does a fantastic job breaking down the important concepts with questions you would encounter in a real job interview. I definitely recommend to anyone and everyone.

results.content: The course started by installing the sublime text editor, then the subsequent lessons used Visual Studio Code with no explanation. Also the instructor used nps with no warning or download instructions. Then the examples downloaded from GitHub didn't work. Too many errors for a "beginner" to keep fixing while trying to follow the course. I'm giving up (at lesson 8) and going to try a different Aurelia course. Waste of money.
